com.metreeca.tray.rdf.graphs

Class RDF4JMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.tray.rdf.Graph
      • com.metreeca.tray.rdf.graphs.RDF4JMemory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public final class RDF4JMemory
extends Graph
    RDF4J memory graph store.

    Manages task execution on an RDF4J SailRepository backed by a MemoryStore.

    • Field Summary

      • RDF4JMemory

        public RDF4JMemory(File storage)
        Creates a persistent RDF4J memory graph.
        Parameters:
        storage - the storage folder where the graph is to be persisted
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if storage is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if storage is not a folder
